sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'
import Calendar from '../calendars/Calendar'
import PersonalCalendar from '../calendars/PersonalCalendar'
import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'
import { Container, Grow, Switch, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'
import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip'
import useStyles from './styles'
import { testEmployees } from '../../testData/testEmployees'

const Schedule = () => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false)
    const employeeSchedule = testEmployees[0]

    return (
        <Grow in>
            <Container className={classes.center}>
                {/* <Container className={classes.center}>
                    <Card className={classes.calendarCard}>
                        <Calendar employeesSchedules={employeesSchedules}/>
                    </Card>
                </Container> */}
                <Container className={classes.switchRow}>
                    <Switch
                        checked={isFlipped}
                        onChange={ (e)=>setIsFlipped(e.target.checked)}
                        name='checked'
                        inputProps={{ 'aria-label': 'calendar checkbox' }}
                    />
                    <Typography>View Everyone's Schedule</Typography>
                </Container>
                <ReactCardFlip flipSpeedFrontToBack='.5' flipSpeedBackToFront='.5' isFlipped={isFlipped} flipDirection='vertical'>
                    <Card className={classes.calendarCard}>
                        <PersonalCalendar />
                    </Card>
                    <Card className={classes.calendarCard}>
                        <Calendar />
                    </Card>
                </ReactCardFlip>
            </Container>
        </Grow>
    )
}

export default Schedule
